project.name: KEIKI Replatform Off Mainframe (KROM) Project
project.description: Replatform the KEIKI System and provide ongoing operations support.

issues.description: Inadequate schedule and resource management practices may lead to project delays.
issues.remedy: Project managers should review and refine the schedule regularly with detailed tasks, realistic durations, and adequate resources.

issues.description: Additional information is needed regarding Protech's program development and testing approach.
issues.remedy: Protech will present their testing approach in May.

issues.description: Ineffective project status meetings and reports can lead to delayed decision-making.
issues.remedy: Improve project status reports to be clear, concise, and relevant to the audience.

issues.description: Untimely project management responsibilities may impact effective project execution.
issues.remedy: Assess the need for additional Protech resources and improve project management responsibilities.

issues.description: Complex data system migration requirements may lead to project delays.
issues.remedy: Develop separate formalized data system migration plans and processes for non-code elements.
